|brand = SimpleWAN |model = Advanced |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = SW302DA-NA |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Router Firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = AMD;GX-412HC;GE412TIYJ44JB; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = X86 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64JVSIQ; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SD Card |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Phison;; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G0846F-BYK0; |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth2chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth3chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0D:B9
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CoreBoot;SeaBIOS;1.10.0.1; |stockos = FreeBSD;;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, mSATA, SATA, USB 3.0 (Type A), SIM Card slot, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |addchip = Super I/O Chipset;Nuvoton;NCT5104D;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input NAND Gate;ON Semi;74VHCT00A;;1;,,, Integrated Power Supply Controller;O2Micro;OZ812;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, 2 + 1 Phase DC/DC for AMD CPU;O2Micro;OZ8321LN;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Anpec;APL5930;;1;,,, 3A 5V 1MHz Synchronous Buck Converter;Anpec;APW8804;;1;,,, High-Performance Notebook PWM Controller;Anpec;APW8828;;1;,,, 30V Dual Asymmetric N-Channel AlphaMOS;AlphaΩAON7934;;6;,,, Dual Ultra High Efficiency DC/DC w/5V Regulator & Switch-Over;O2Micro;OZ8153LN;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = PC-Engines |manuf_model = apu.2c |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Switzerland
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[AMD]]'' GX-412TC Quad-core 64bit X86 (@1GHz) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 8MB SPI Flash, 4GB SD Card, mSATA, SATA *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0 host port *PCI: 2x Mini PCIe *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://support.simplewan.com/portal/en/kb/articles/setting-up-your-unit SetUp Guide] * [https://www.pcengines.ch/apu2c2.htm OEM Info]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:SimpleWAN 2 SD302DA-NA Top.jpeg|Board Top File:SimpleWAN 2 SD302DA-NA Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
